name: Meaty McSkinBones
description: Meaty McSkinBones is a single-player puzzle/platformer where the character is split into three separate bodies. They each have unique abilities or can work together to solve puzzles and traverse the environment. It's quirky, hilarious, and a ton of fun!
minimum_requirements: 最低: OS: Windows 8 プロセッサー: Intel Core 2 Duo E4500 @ 2.2GHz or AMD Athlon 64 X2 5600+ @ 2.8 GHz メモリー: 512 MB RAM グラフィック: GeForce 240 GT or Radeon HD 6570 – 1024 MB (1 gig) ストレージ: 3 GB 利用可能 追記事項: *Controller is Required*
recommended_requirements: 推奨: OS: Windows 10 プロセッサー: Intel Core i5 2300 or AMD FX6120 メモリー: 4 GB RAM グラフィック: GeForce GTX 550 Ti or Radeon HD 6770 ストレージ: 4 GB 利用可能 追記事項: *Controller is Required*
